function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"UVC and UVGI light disinfectant strategies for buildings may have unintended consequences if not implemented with appropriate precaution.","Impact":"Increased risk of unintended consequences and potential harm to occupants if UVC and UVGI treatment is not implemented safely.","Mitigation":"Conduct further research to verify the margin of safety before implementation, and implement with appropriate precaution.","Technologies":"UVC and UVGI light","People":"Building occupants, especially those with sensitivities to UV light","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners, and health and safety professionals"},{"Description":"Spatial configurations designed to encourage social interactions may inadvertently enhance opportunities for transmission of viruses.","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission due to spatial configurations that encourage social interactions.","Mitigation":"Consider implementing social-distancing measures, limiting occupant density, and understanding the spatial disposition to make informed decisions.","Technologies":"Space syntax analysis, spatial configuration redesign","People":"Building occupants, especially in densely populated open office spaces","Owner":"Facility managers, architects, and designers"}]}
